description: A survey treatment of the development of Latin to modern Spanish, with emphasis on relations between external history and the development of grammatical structure and vocabulary, and major sound shifts. Lectures and discussions of reading.
name: HIST OF SPANISH LANGUAGE: Language, Conflict, and Identity:  A Linguistic History of Iberia

section.name: HIST OF SPANISH LANGUAGE: Language, Conflict, and Identity:  A Linguistic History of Iberia
